2971:0: Bhadracaryādeśanā I yāvata keci daśad-diśi loke sarva-triyadhva-gatā nara-siṁhāḥ tān ahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ|
2971:1: (1) II kṣetra-rajopana-kāya-pramāṇaiḥ sarva-jināna karomi praṇāmam sarva-jinābhimukhena manena bhadra-carī-praṇidhāna-balena|
2971:2: III eka-rajāgri rajopama-buddhā buddha-sutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye evam aśeṣata dharmata-dhātuṁ sarvādhimucyami pūrṇa jinebhiḥ|
2971:3: (2) IV teṣu ca akṣaya-varṇa-samudrān sarva-svarāṅga-samudra-rutebhiḥ sarva-jināna guṇān bhaṇamānas tān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān|
2971:5: dīpa-varebhi ca dhūpa-varebhiḥ pūjana teṣu jināna karomi|
2971:6: VI vastra-varebhi ca gandha-varebhiś cūrṇa-puṭebhi ca meru-samebhiḥ sarva-viśiṣṭa-viyūha-varebhiḥ pūjana teṣu jināna karomi|
2971:7: VII yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tān adhimucyami sarva-jinānām bhadra-carī-adhimukti-balena vandami pūjayamī jina sarvān|
2971:8: (4) VIII yac ca kṛtaṁ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu moha-vaśena kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṁ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam|
2971:9: IX yac ca daśad-diśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa-aśaikṣa-pratyekajinānām buddha-sutān' atha sarva-jinānāṁ taṁ anumodayamī ahu sarvam|
2971:10: (5) X ye ca daśad-diśi loka-pradīpā bodhi vibudhya asaṅgata prāptāḥ tān ahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṁś cakru anuttaru varttanatāyai|
2971:11: XI ye'pi ca nirvṛti darśitu-kāmās tān abhiyācami prāñjali-bhūtaḥ kṣetra-rajopama-kalpa sthihantu sarva-jagasya hitāya sukhāya|
2971:12: (6) XII vandana-pūjana-deśanatāya modan'-adhyeṣana-yācanatāya yac ca śubhaṁ mayi saṁcitu kiṁcid bodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam|
2971:13: (7) XIII pūjita bhontu atītaku buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśad-diśi loke ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇa-manoratha bodhi-vibuddhā|
2971:14: XIV yāvata keci daśad-diśi kṣetrās te pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ bodhi-drumendra-gatebhi jinebhir buddha-sutebhi ca bhontu prapūrṇāḥ|
2971:15: (8) XV yāvata keci daśad-diśi sattvās te sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ sarva-jagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā|
2971:16: XVI bodhi-cariṁ ca ahaṁ caramāṇo bhavi jāti-smaru sarva-gatīṣu sarvasu janmasu cyuty-upapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā|
2971:17: (9) XVII sarva-jinān' anuśikṣayamāṇo bhadra-cariṁ paripūrayamāṇaḥ śila-cariṁ vimalāṁ pariśuddhāṁ nityam akhaṇḍam acchidra careyam|
2971:18: XVIII deva-rutebhi ca nāga-rutebhir yakṣa-kumbhāṇḍa-manuṣya-rutebhiḥ yāni ca sarva-rutāni jagasya sarva-ruteṣv ahu deśayi dharmam|
2971:19: (10) XIX peśalu pāramitāsv abhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet ye'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyās teṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam|
2971:20: XX karmatu kleśatu māra-pathāto loka-gatīṣu vimuktu careyam padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gagane'va asaktaḥ|
2971:21: (11) XXI sarvi apāya-dukhāṁ praśamanto sarva-jagat sthāpayamānaḥ sarva-jagasya hitāya careyaṁ yāvata kṣetra-pathā diśa tāsu|
2971:22: XXII sattva-cariṁ anuvartayamāno bodhi-cariṁ paripūrayamāṇaḥ bhadra-cariṁ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata-kalpa careyam|
2971:23: (12) XXIII ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā eka-cari-praṇidhāna careyam|
2971:24: XXIV ye'pi ca mitrā mama hita-kāmā bhadra-carīya nidarśayitāraḥ tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṁś ca ahaṁ na virāgayi jātu|
2971:25: (13) XXV dhārayamāṇu jināna sad-dharmaṁ bodhi-cariṁ paridīpayamānaḥ bhadra-cariṁ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgata-kalpa careyam|
2971:26: XXVI saṁmukha nityam ahaṁ jina paśye buddha-sutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṁ sarvi anāgata-kalpa-m-akhinnāḥ|
2971:27: (14) XXVII sarva-bhaveṣu ca saṁsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣaya-prāptaḥ prajña-upāya-samādhi-vimokṣaiḥ sarva-guṇair bhavi akṣaya-kośaḥ|
2971:28: XXVIII eka-rajāgri rajopama-kṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān buddha-sutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhi-cariṁ caramāṇaḥ|
2971:29: (15) XXIX evam aśeṣata sarva-diśāsu vāla-patheṣu triyadhva-pramāṇān buddha-samudr' atha kṣetra-samudrān otari cārika-kalpa samudrān|
2971:30: XXX eka-svarāṅga-samudra-rutebhiḥ sarva-jināna svarāṅga-viśuddhim sarva-jagasya yath' āśaya-ghoṣān buddha-sarasvatim otari nityam|
2971:31: (16) XXXI teṣu ca akṣaya-ghoṣa-ruteṣu sarva-triyadhva-gatāna jinānām cakra-nayaṁ parivartayamāno buddhi-balena ahaṁ praviśeyam|
2971:32: XXXII eka-kṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpa-praveśa ahaṁ praviśeyam ye'pi ca kalpa triyadhva-pramāṇās tān kṣaṇa-koṭi-praviṣṭa careyam|
2971:33: (17) XXXIII ye ce triyadhva-gatā nara-siṁhāṁs tān ahu paśyiya eka-kṣaṇena teṣu ca gocarim otari nityaṁ māya-gatena vimokṣa-balena|
2971:34: XXXIV ye ca triyadhvasu kṣetra-viyūhāṁs tān abhinirhari eka-rajāgre evam aśeṣata sarva-diśāsu otari kṣetra-viyūha jinānām|
2971:35: (18) XXXV ye ca anāgata loka-pradīpās teṣu vibudhyana cakra-pravṛttim nirvṛti-darśana niṣṭha-praśāntiṁ sarvi ahaṁ upasaṁkrami nāthān|
2971:36: XXXVI ṛddhi-balena samanta-javena yāna-balena samanta-mukhena carya-balena samanta-guṇena maitra-balena samanta-gatena (19)
2971:37: XXXVII puṇya-balena samanta-śubhena jñāna-balena asaṅga-gatena prajña-upāya-samādhi-balena bodhi-balaṁ samudānayamānaḥ|
2971:38: XXXVIII karma-balaṁ pariśodhayamānaḥ kleśa-balaṁ parimardayamānaḥ māra-balaṁ abalaṁ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadra-carī-bala sarvān|
2971:39: (20) XXXIX kṣetra-samudra viśodhayamānaḥ sattva-samudra vimocayamānaḥ dharma-samudra vipaśyayamāno jñāna-samudra vigāhayamānaḥ|
2971:40: XL carya-samudra viśodhayamānaḥ praṇidhi-samudra prapūrayamāṇaḥ buddha-samudra prapūjayamānaḥ kalpa-samudra careyam akhinnaḥ|
2971:41: (21) XLI ye ca triyadhva-gatāna jinānāṁ bodhi-cari-praṇidhāna-viśeṣāḥ tān ahu pūraya sarvi aśeṣān bhadra-carīya vibudhyiya bodhim|
2971:42: XLII jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarva-jinānāṁ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ tasya vidusya sabhāga-carīye nāmayamī kuśalaṁ imu sarvam|
2971:43: (22) XLIII kāyatu vāca manasya viśuddhiś carya-viśuddhy atha kṣetra-viśuddhiḥ yādṛśa nāmana bhadra-vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṁ mama tena|
2971:44: XLIV bhadra-carīya samanta-śubhāye mañjuśirī-praṇidhāna careyam sarvi anāgata-kalpa-m -akhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṁ kriya sarvi aśeṣām|
2971:45: (23) XLV no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānayi sarvi vikurvitu teṣām|
2971:46: XLVI yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata-niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam|
2971:47: (24) XLVII ye ca daśad-diśi kṣetra anantā ratna-alaṁkṛtu dadyu jinānām divya ca mānuṣa saukhya viśiṣṭāṁ kṣetra-rajopama-kalpa dadeyam|
2971:48: XLVIII yaś ca imaṁ pariṇāmana-rājaṁ śrutva sakṛj janayed adhimuktim bodhi-varām anuprārthayamāno agru viśiṣṭa bhaved imu puṇyam|
2971:49: (25) XLIX varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ kṣipru sa paśyati taṁ amitābhaṁ yasy imu bhadra-cari-praṇidhānam|
2971:50: L lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṁ sv-āgata te imu mānuṣa janma yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadras te'pi tathā na-cireṇa bhavanti|
2971:51: (26) LI pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñāna-vaśena kṛtāni so imu bhadra-cariṁ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu bhoti aśeṣam|
2971:52: LII jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataś ca varṇatu gotratu bhoti-r-upetaḥ tīrthika-māra-gaṇebhir adhṛṣyaḥ pūjitu bhoti sa sarva-triloke|
2971:53: LIII kṣipru sa gacchati bodhi-drumendra gatva niṣīdati sattva-hitāya budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakra dharṣayi māru sa-sainyaku sarvam|
2971:54: (27) LIV yo imu bhadra-cari-praṇidhānaṁ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā buddha vijānati yo'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha|
2971:55: LVI sarva-triyadhva-gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā tāya ahaṁ kuśalaṁ imu sarvaṁ nāmayamī vara-bhadra-carīye|
2971:56: (28) LVII kāla-kṛyāṁ ca ahaṁ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān saṁmukha paśyiya taṁ amitābhaṁ taṁ ca sukhāvati-kṣetra vrajeyam|
2971:57: (29) LVIII tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrāḥ tāṁś ca ahaṁ paripūrya aśeṣān sattva-hitaṁ kari yāvata loke|
2971:58: LIX tahi jina-maṇḍali śobhani ramye padma-vare rucire upapannaḥ vyākaraṇaṁ ahu tatra labheyyā saṁmukhato amitābha-jinasya|
2971:59: LX vyākaraṇaṁ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita-koṭi-śatebhir anekaiḥ sattva-hitāni bahūny ahu kuryāṁ dikṣu daśasv api buddhi-balena|
2971:60: (30) LXII bhadra-cariṁ pariṇāmya yad-āptaṁ puṇyam anantam atīva viśiṣṭam tena jagad vyasanaugha-nimagnaṁ yātv amitābha-puriṁ varam eva|
2971:61: LXI bhadra-cari-praṇidhāna paṭhitvā yat kuśalaṁ mayi saṁcitu kiṁcit eka-kṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṁ tena jagasya śubhaṁ praṇidhānam| (31)
